author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR extends the IOPool schema evolution tests to cover split levels 0 and 99 (earlier version of the tests implicitly used split level 99). It is a preparatory step to extend the schema evolution testing to cover `std::auto_ptr` to `std::unique_ptr` evolution in order to test https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43923#issuecomment-2898938773

Needs https://github.com/cms-data/IOPool-Input/pull/3

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1537

#### PR validation:

Unit test runs
title: Extend schema evolution test to cover splitLevel 0 and 99
